title: Taken By A Dark Pegasus
description: Working on a peach farm during the sweltering summer in Georgia, January decides to take a trip up north to visit her cousin's cabin for the weekend as a getaway. While at his small cabin, January comes across evidence of a wild beast that has been tearing apart the backyard during the night. She finally finds out what has been terrorizing her cousin's home! A dark Pegasus who has come for only one thingâ€¦ her body!  This is a 3,500 word hardcore erotic short story. It includes: Mind control, oral sex, beast love, cream pies and more!
author: Whitney Fox
